g o d  l e g s  c a m i l l e

I'm not the type of guy shouting "plagiarism" to everything but really ?

Asura's Wrath ?

Come on Riot

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
More a case of the same inspiration for multiple things - ie, wukong, those giant frogs in every magical ninja game/anime.

You do know AW is also based on mythology, right?

Next you're gonna sue Greek mythology for copying God of War

Asura is a character from the asian folklore.
It's not a mere reference to another game.
Still needs fixing for the in game model
Damn why am I ass at Jax

it's a gorgeous skin and it could've been a beautiful legendary skin.
it had so much potential, but it all went to waste, i'm sad about it :/
??? You're really complaining about this skin? Have you seen his other skins?!?

I never said I was complaining, if you re-read I said it's a gorgeous skin, but it had a lot of potential to be a legendary compared to the skin line it sort of fits into. :) 

His other skins are also good, but they're best at being normal to epic. Unless your imagination can take it to being a legendary, that's all you buddy, for me this skin had a lot of potential of being a legendary, that is all I'm saying. Good day.
Do the extra arms suggest Jax rework with 6 arms jax skin??? XD probably not but lets stir up some theory crafting. XD
Yes please thank you
Project Yasuo + Wukong + God Fist Lee Sin + some Jax Stuff = God Staff Jax
The only down side to this skin is that his play rate is going to explode
Hey, just imagine what it would be like post VGU
but there isnt any plan to rework him yet :(
Well not yet but it will come eventually
I'd like the skin better if he actually used those other arms, showing them in the splash feels like false advertising.
